title: FS - N162 Dan Brouthers SGC 20 HOF
author: ccre

posts.post_title: FS - N162 Dan Brouthers SGC 20 HOF
posts.post_content: Pending. Nice presentation for the grade. $500 + $7.50 shipping. Paypal f/f or checks accepted. Let me know if you have any questions. Thanks for looking. Dave
Check is in the mail Dave. Thx
Dan that was a nice buy. It's not really in my collecting wheelhouse right now, but I kept looking at it.  Thanks for removing the temptation!
